data.title: Microsoft tells Bay Area and Puget Sound employees to work from home if possible as coronavirus spreads
data.text: Microsoft said business travel in areas where the coronavirus is active should be canceled.

data.title: Apple, Microsoft, Google look to move production away from China. That's not going to be easy
data.text: With the U.S.-China trade war last year and the outbreak of the new coronavirus, American technology firms have looked to move production from China.

data.title: Microsoft’s new coronavirus plan: Seattle-area employees to work from home for next 3 weeks
data.text: Microsoft is recommending that all of its Seattle-area employees who can do their jobs from home should do so for the next three weeks, through March 25, in the latest effort to thwart the spread of the novel coronavirus.

data.title: Restraint Is Required When Considering Microsoft Stock Now
data.text: In lockstep with the broader markets, Microsoft stock suffered a steep drop. But waiting out the black swan event that is the coronavirus is probably the smarter bet.

data.title: 5 Big Reasons Stocks Will Rebound From the Coronavirus Selloff
data.text: This bull market has caught the coronavirus, but it will rebound. Here's why, and even some stocks to buy on the dip.
